summary: Party bum slacker Belcher is dead, but he's not resting in peace. When he learns that his cousin Krista has started dating his best pal and former roommate Will, the restless spirit makes it his mission to drive the happy couple apart.
cast: Ryan Dunn|April Scott|Gerard Haitz|Noam Harary|Chris Ready|Tasha Courtney|Cameron Taylor|Bam Margera|Mark Hanna|Patrick Michael|Raymond Mamrak|Joey Rozmus|Scott Herman|Gerry Michaels|Lavrenti Lopes|Jon Dean|William Hubert Ferrell Jr.|Ronald Ford|John Charles Hunt|Falon Joslyn|A.J. Khan|Debra Morse|Andy Schoeb|Lee Van Dusen|Patrick Wilbraham
title: Living Will...
